DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if collagenase injection will reduce or eliminate the appearance of cellulite of the thigh.
DOC.brief_title: Collagenase in the Treatment of Cellulite
DOC.detailed_description: This is an open label study of collagenase injection therapy for reduction and/or elimination of cellulite of the posterolateral thighs.
DOC.criteria: 10 x 10 cm area of cellulite of the posterolateral thigh(s) any chronic, serious or uncontrolled medical condition inability to conform to study visits (1215 per year)
